name: unstable (Justin)
description:
Chaos magic has run amok of this tower. What is causing this mayhem? Is the answer at the top of the tower? Maybe you just can't reach the top of the tower. Nah, there's no way you could get to the top of the tower. (For your sanity, there is no 'top' of the tower.) ...Unless...?

Controls
W/Up arrow  for jump, A/left arrow for left, and D/right arrow for right.

Be wary, chaos magic will tamper with your controls.

To succeed, climb the tower, and collect chaos orbs.

Three instances of damage will be fatal. 

Developer

@JustinWongDev
